actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $200,000, and extend the time for paying certain estate taxes.

summary.text: Increases, pursuant to the Internal Revenue Code, the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $200,000. Extends the time for paying specified estate taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $200,000, and extend the time for paying certain estate taxes.
